oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Subías Rapún, José María
Jekel, Martin
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adsorption of chromium and phosphate on the fine fraction of granulated ferric hydroxide - influence of ph and water matrix on adsorption equilibrium
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: - Study the adsorption equilibrium of granulated ferric hydroxide, using micro and nano (agglomerated) particles. - Adsorption of inorganic substances (phosphat and chromium), which are contaminants coming from the industrial residual water, dangerous for human health and life in ecosystems. - Determination of influence of pH value and water matrix.
